lead_paragraph: Ms. Ferraro’s resignation comes days after Paul Lee, the now-former president of ABC Entertainment, was fired. She took the role only nine months ago.

headline.print_headline: Co-Leader of Consumer Products Is 2nd Disney Executive in a Week to Step Down
headline.main: Leslie Ferraro, Disney’s Co-Chairwoman of Digital Media, Resigns

snippet: Ms. Ferraro’s resignation comes days after Paul Lee, the now-former president of ABC Entertainment, was fired. She took the role only nine months ago.
abstract: Walt Disney co-chairwoman of consumer products and digital media Leslie Ferraro resigns under pressure; is 2nd executive in week to step down.
